artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Yorozuya Magobei; Carver: Watanabe Eizō I
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 337.7; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 301.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: portrait of a man with an elaborate "winged" hairstyle with a rounded ponytail; grimacing expression; man looks toward PL, wearing a green vest with white dots in floral design at shoulders, trimmed with blue cord around neck, and purple garment with yellow and red leaves beneath vest; red ground behind man; border around portrait is grey at top with maroon starburst and purple ground with white floral pattern at bottom
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Seven Brilliant Stars (Kōmei shichi yōsei 光明七陽盛)
title: Flare of the Signal Fire: Actor Ichikawa Sadanji I as Sakuma Morimasa
